attributes.action: appoint Joanna Lumley as Prime Minister with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following her recent victory in parliament on behalf of the Gurkhas Joanna Lumley has proved that not only can she identify the correct course of action but unlike most existing politicians is capable of carrying out that course of action

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
